data.title: Ruben Studdard, A Famous United States Vocalist's Complete Profile
data.meta_description: Ruben Studdard is a famous United States Vocalist. You can know the age, biography, family, career, and other details about Ruben Studdard at Ruben Studdard Profile at UrduPoint.
data.text:
Ruben Studdard Bio, Wiki

The full name of the famous Singer is Ruben Studdard. He is renowned as an Singer, Actor.

Ruben Studdard Age

He was born on September 12, 1978 and is now 45 Years years old. His Zodiac sign is Virgo.

Ruben Studdard Height and Weight

He is 6 feet and 3 inches tall and weighs 155 kg.

Ruben Studdard Birth Place

Ruben Studdard was born in Frankfurt, West Germany.

Ruben Studdard Nationality

He is a American national.

Ruben Studdard Residence

Ruben Studdard lives in United States.

Ruben Studdard Spouse

He married with Surata Zuri McCants (m. 2008-2012).

Ruben Studdard Net Worth

Ruben Studdard is a renowned Singer, and His estimated net worth is $4 million.

Ruben Studdard Social Media Contact

You can follow Ruben Studdard on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, and YouTube at His official social media accounts mentioned above. You can also see here the awesome picture collection of Ruben Studdard.
